subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally {{Han compound|阜|肖|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=soil mountain}}, later {{Han compound|山|肖|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=mountain}}.
